mapper.select: SELECT NO, ITEM_CODE, PARENT_ITEM_CODE , NET_AMOUNT, DESCRIPTION FROM BOM

SELECT ITEMBOM.ITEM_CODE , ITEMBOM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE , ITEMBOM.ITEM_NAME , ITEMBOM.ITEM_CLASSIFICATION , ITEMBOM.LEAD_TIME , ITEMBOM.LOSS_RATE , ITEMBOM.NET_AMOUNT , ITEMBOM.STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE , EM.ITEM_NAME AS PARENT_ITEM_NAME FROM ( SELECT B.ITEM_CODE , B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE , I.ITEM_NAME , I.LEAD_TIME , NVL(I.LOSS_RATE,0) LOSS_RATE , B.NET_AMOUNT , I.ITEM_CLASSIFICATION , I.STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE FROM BOM B , ITEM I WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE START WITH B.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} CONNECT BY
PRIOR B.ITEM_CODE = B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE ORDER BY B.NO ) ITEMBOM, ITEM EM WHERE ITEMBOM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = EM.ITEM_CODE(+)
PRIOR B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE ORDER BY B.NO ) ITEMBOM, ITEM EM WHERE ITEMBOM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = EM.ITEM_CODE(+)

SELECT LEV_BOM.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE ,LEV_BOM.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME ,LEV_BOM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE AS PARENT_ITEM_CODE ,IM.ITEM_NAME AS PARENT_ITEM_NAME ,LEV_BOM.UNIT_OF_STOCK AS UNIT_OF_STOCK ,LEV_BOM.LOSS_RATE AS LOSS_RATE ,LEV_BOM.LEAD_TIME AS LEAD_TIME ,LEV_BOM.STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE AS STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE FROM(SELECT B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE AS PARENT_ITEM_CODE ,LPAD(' ',7*(LEVEL-1)) || B.ITEM_CODE AS ITEM_CODE ,I.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME ,I.UNIT_OF_STOCK AS UNIT_OF_STOCK ,NVL(I.LOSS_RATE,0) AS LOSS_RATE ,I.LEAD_TIME AS LEAD_TIME ,I.STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE AS STANDARD_UNIT_PRICE FROM BOM B, ITEM I WHERE B.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE START WITH B.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} CONNECT BY
PRIOR B.ITEM_CODE = B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE ORDER BY B.NO)LEV_BOM , ITEM IM WHERE LEV_BOM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = IM.ITEM_CODE(+)
PRIOR B.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE ORDER BY B.NO)LEV_BOM , ITEM IM WHERE LEV_BOM.PARENT_ITEM_CODE = IM.ITEM_CODE(+)
